quoteText: Facebook uses cookies and receives information when you visit those sites and apps, including device information and information about your activity, without any further action from you. This occurs whether or not you have a Facebook account or are logged in. </
title: Facebook stores your data whether you have an account or not.

tosdr.case: They store data on you even if you did not interact with the service
tosdr.tldr: This is the principle of their shady "Shadow Profile".
